class_notes: (Instructor: Gilha Lee) (Prerequisites: BL 521 and 522 or equivalent)  (HYBRID: live session in person on-campus Tuesdays 2:30-4:30pm; remaking contact time fulfilled via asynchronous online engagement)
course_description: Emphasis on increasing student's knowledge of Koine Greek vocabulary, grammar, and syntax through weekly readings covering portions of the New Testament and other Greek literature. This course may be repeated for credit when the reading selections vary.
prerequisites: This requirement mandates BL521 and BL522 as prerequisites.
schedule_location: T 2:30pm-4:30pm in Rita Anne Rollins Building_549
sections: Class Nbr: 4200, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: T 2:30-4:30p, Instructor: G. Lee, Status: Open
